item.title: DNS_Server Config
item.description: Install emerge -aqv bind bind-tools Config /* * Refer to the named.conf(5) and named(8) man pages, and the documentation * in /usr/share/doc/bind-* for more details. * Online versions of the documentation can be found here: * https://kb.isc.org/article/AA-01031 * * If you are going to set up an authoritative server, make sure you * understand the hairy details of how DNS works. Even with simple mistakes, * you can break connectivity
